bwwExcerpt: "Everybody's Talking About Jamie" takes us to a high school in current day Sheffield, England, where 16 year old Jamie sits, bored, along with his classmates in a careers class. They've all taken an aptitude test and Jamie's came back "forklift driver". Meanwhile he secretly dreams of being a drag queen and wearing a dress to prom.
